alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 4:52PM CST until November 29 at 9:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. This snow has caused numerous slide offs and crashes. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wabasha, Dodge, Olmsted and Mower Counties. In Wisconsin, Buffalo County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
